features: Dry and Wet Use：Soak water to become wet wipes. Wet wipe will be much durable than dry wipe after wetted.(Inform: This is a small size, please pay attention to check)
Gentle to baby's skin: No parabens. No alcohol. There is No irritating chemicals. Parents can be trusted.

Easily achieve green environmental protection: Our goal is to more easily bring green products to parents, so as to save the planet for future generations. Fully 100% biodegradable can effectively reduce the impact of man-made environment.

Multipurpose:Ideal for caring baby’s sensitive skin, baby teeth. dry wipes can creates a healthy oral environment for emerging teeth. Use one to clean around the surface of teeth, gums, tongue, and cheeks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COTTONCARE cotton paper towels are made of 100% cotton, soft like baby skin, strong water absorption, not easy to pilling, our spunlace non-woven fabric can significantly reduce energy and carbon emissions. It is a friendly substitute for paper towels, towels, wet wipes and other products. Our reusable tissue paper is a simple solution to reduce deforestation. We are firmly committed to finding the greenest, most sustainable and innovative environmental pollution solutions. This product is a small size of 12*20cm, please pay attention!

Cloth face towels can easily breed bacteria in a humid environment. One-time cotton soft towel can relieve the burden of cloth hand towels that breed bacteria, and can better take care of your baby's sensitive skin. 100% cotton towels made of cotton plants are very convenient to use, soft and delicate, with good water absorption and no swarf.Without any additives, it will not harm the skin. Moderate thickness, relatively soft,Small and suitable,Strong and durable, will not tear when exposed to water, high tensile strength, can be washed 1-2 times. For example, when you use baby tissue to clean your face once, wipe it dry and use it again to clean your hands.（BUT Please NOTE Don't flush it.）

Wet and dry It can clean hands, face, nose, buttocks and other parts directly. Add clean water to become a wet wipe, very suitable for cleaning baby's teeth, mouth, eyes, hands, face and diaper area. washable COTTONCARE baby cotton paper towels can be washed 1-2 times, and can be used to clean tables and chairs after washing. No chemicals, no smell, take good care of your baby's sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, so soft
reviews.reviewText: These are the second dry cotton wipes I’ve tried and I really like them. My baby has sensitive skin so traditional wet wipes are a no-no for his diaper area. I use dry wipes soaked in water to clean his diaper area during diaper changes and these wipes are truly good quality. They’re soft yet strong. They’re smaller than other dry wipes but I like the size, I can warm them up between the palms of my hand before cleaning my baby. I will be buying them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Diaper Rash Helper
reviews.reviewText: Wanted something to dry baby during diaper change. Wipes inevitably left baby's skin moist and prone to getting a rash. Paper towels are way too rough and toilet paper left pieces. These were perfect! They are very tough as stated and can be wet and used to wipe down baby or even toys, countertop, baby seat, ect. Haven't had one tear on me yet. They are a bit pricey but to be honest worth it if it prevents the pain of diaper rash and works well with sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and durable
reviews.reviewText: I was afraid these would be like one ply but they definitely aren't. They're so soft and strong. They helped with my girls diaper rash who is teething and gets diarrhea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for Between Showering
reviews.reviewText: Updated Review:I ordered these in November and it's now January 1st. I was sick all of December, first with an upper respiratory infection (head cold), and on top of that a bacterial infection attacked my lungs, then a week later, I got sick with Covid! Being so sick, I wasn't able to shower as frequently as I prefer, and the fevering (for both viral infections and the bacterial infection) got me nasty sweaty.These wipes came in very handy! I was able to wet them with warm water from my tap (below freezing temps in my area, while sick) and clean the important parts (lady bits, under breasts, arm pits, inner elbows, tummy, etc) before crawling back into bed.Because of the convenience during one of the worst sick times I've had in years, I have increased from 3 stars to 4 stars. I can't rate these a 5, because when I do wet them with plain well water, there's a chemical odor. I haven't had a negative reaction, yet, but I do find this to be concerning and a potential drawback for persons who are more sensitive than I am.So far, I'm pleased with these dry wipes. Simple, easy, and convenient. I do recommend giving these a try.End Updated Review~~~~~~~~Original Review:My photos tend to get lost, so I'm uploading the photos now; will write review after using.In the meantime, the English translation is pretty funny and I got a kick out of "be careful not to eat by mistake." 😂Perferated top for easy opening; no reclosing, as it becomes similar to tissue box or dried out wipes. Packed well. No odor! 🙌🏻 I'm very sensitive to scents and odors, so I'm glad there's none while dry. I did purchase for myself, an adult; if product works well for me, I'll see how it does for my grandson.Dry sheet is softer than a paper towel or dryer sheet (another reviewer said it was the same -- it's not). Feels clean to the touch and soft. I'm looking forward to using these for in-between shower time clean ups.I will rerate & update review at a later time. Meanwhile, I hope the pics are helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s cotton blend not 100% cotton
reviews.reviewText: I did burning tests on 100% polyester, 100% cotton and this wipe. I think this one is a blend, not pure cotton. That being said, the seller refunded, so no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not 100% cotton; CAUTION: Seller’s Refund Promise
reviews.reviewText: I got these dry wipes to help with my baby’s diaper changes and to deal with drool. I’d bought them before and had some left from my previous order. But I just noticed that the absorbency was lacking. The wipes felt smoother, which I think affected how well they soaked up stuff. After using them, my baby’s skin would still be a bit wet, and when I tried them on my face, they didn’t feel as soft, kinda scratchy, to be honest. I've washed my face, but even after patting it dry with this dry wipe twice, it still feels damp.I got contacted by the seller after I received the stuff, and they asked to take the review down. They sent a screenshot showing they canceled my order and promised I’d get my money back. But then I noticed that the order status said it was canceled before shipping. But guess what? I already got the stuff, and my bank charged me for it. . In general, once the bank has deducted a payment, the bank does not automatically refund it. The seller continued to claim that canceling the order would result in a refund, but in reality, that wasn’t the case. Frustrated, I contacted Amazon support, and they quickly sorted it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good price but smaller size
reviews.reviewText: Good price but size is smaller than I normally got

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cottoncare Baby Dry Wipes
reviews.reviewText: The Dry wipes are great. Very soft to the skin. I recommend them to everyone.There’s nothing to dislike about them.I’ll be ordering more.

Our doctor recommended dry wipes so it’s less chemicals so we bought these for our baby & it’s been great. They aren’t the best if you need to blow ur own nose but it’s great for cleaning her face and for diaper changes.It’s most effective when wet but still does the job dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Lovely package design and quality product
